website_summaries.verdict: Durable product from leading manufacturer with tightly wrapped ear flaps for a good fit.
pros: Offered in four different color options
Meets NOCSAE standards for helmets for baseball players
Makes use of ABS-style plastic to yield maximum protection against impact
Uses a wrapped design near ear holes to ensure a tight fit that won't bounce around on the head
cons: Makes use of a glossy finish on plastic that some players dislike

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet to fit my 8 year old son
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet to fit my 8 year old son. the only reason i gave 4 stars is because of the color. i ordered the royal blue and the blue that came was not really royal blue, but more of a deeper blue to a navy. no big deal though, i was just trying to match my sons uniform color. but if your child is through the ages of 7-9, i say purchase this helmet! can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: HOLLYV

customer_reviews.title: Decent helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice helmet at a good price. Note that this is the regular version of the Z5, so it has a shiny/glossy finish. There also is a "grip" version, which has a matte finish. Amazon sells that one too, but it costs more. If you go to Easton's website, it will show you the different variations of the Z5 that are available. As one reviewer noted, the padding on the inside of this one is a little different, and not quite as good as the grip version.
customer_reviews.author: P. DeRosier

customer_reviews.title: My little slugger loves his batting helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this EASTON battling helmet for my four year old son and he loves it. It’s easy for him to take on and off and he’s never complained about it being uncomfortable or too tight. He gets a little sweaty running around the bases with it on, but that’s too be expected considering the padding and construction. Would recommend it for t-ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality , my son loved it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this helmet with one day delivery, seems very good quality and my son says it is very comfortable. He is 8 yrs old and it fits him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: elena del toro

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet by mistake and didnt want to return it. I forgot how much of a big head my 3 year old has so a tball helmet wasnt the way to go for me. But its quality is awesome! Perfect helmet for your young tball players.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Does not include chin strap!
customer_reviews.text: Without a chin strap it is useless. Now we have to shop around to find one. With COVID-19 going around shopping is difficult. W/O strap I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints. This is a nice helmet with plenty of padding. I highly doubt I'll have any issues, but if they do arise....I'll be back.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid Frost

customer_reviews.title: Slides off easily when taking it off so it’s not tugging on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits our 5 year old perfectly. Not loose, not too tight. Slides off easily when taking it off so it’s not tugging on his ears. Not sure how many seasons we’ll get out of this, but if we get one more, I’ll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: PatTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit great color option
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment. I did not like the idea of my son sharing a helmet. This was a great deal. I used vinyl lettering to put his name on the back so that others would not use it. He was also the only one with red so I love this color option! He is an average size 10 year old and it fit him well and he could wear his glasses with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle Marie

customer_reviews.title: great baseball helmet
customer_reviews.text: great little helmet. bought for my 7 year old. fits a little loose but is nice and snug when worn with a ball cap (which was our intent) He will get serveral years out of this and some great protection!
customer_reviews.author: SKAP

customer_reviews.title: Protection - Ventilation - Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and isn't all that heavy for being an inexpensive option. Provides good coverage and has plenty of ventilation. Has snaps for chin straps or face guards. Pretty nice for those germaphobes or those who fear lice from shared gear.
customer_reviews.author: DB BluBlock Productions

customer_reviews.title: Helmet has held up great ot a fall season of play
customer_reviews.text: Helmet has held up great ot a fall season of play. It fit my 7 year old son with a little room to spare, but not too loose to make it unusable. I think he'll get several seasons out of it before needing something larger. Likely will not wear it out before growing out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F

customer_reviews.title: The blue I received is so dark it's almost like a navy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday and seems to fit my large headed 7 year old perfectly. The only reason I gave it less stars is because the royal blue I ordered is NOT the same color as in the picture. The blue I received is so dark it's almost like a navy. The picture is very deceptive!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: ... is larger than my own head) and it fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my 9 year old son who has a rather large head (his head is larger than my own head) and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: great price!
customer_reviews.text: it fits well. true to size and price is awesome for Easton helmet.
customer_reviews.author: pteli78

customer_reviews.title: Great for My 5-yr-old
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a "real" baseball helmet for my son, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kpg

customer_reviews.title: Looks like
customer_reviews.text: Helmet has these ridiculous stickers across the front that were impossible to take off & when I finally did left glue that will not come off & now have damaged the paint before I was able to have my son wear it one time! Looks like crap
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly like I wanted it to. It’s not too tight for my 5 year old son’s head and is great quality. Exactly what he needed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy PM

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine helmet, for kids with large heads. The coach recommended this helmet, but it is way too big for my seven-year-old head. Since it cost between $5.99 and $11.99 to return I guess I'll keep it till he grows into it.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT -- Review revised
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. Comes with a big logo on the front, which is not pictured. Hard to put a logo on the front when one is already there. Logo actually comes off easily--my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: AFJAG97

customer_reviews.title: GLOSSY helmet !
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 1 star review because the helmet that was shipped is GLOSSY and not matte as seen in the picture. Also, it says that the ear protection foam is wrapped for long durability and it is not, the foam is exposed against the ear, nothing wrapped around the foam. I wonder if they shipped the original product as described on their web site.
customer_reviews.author: DC Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the ergonomic, lightweight, comfortable feel that this versatile helmet has had for my nephew. Well made, sturdy safety product that will keep youth ball players safe, but still able to move around with the helmet on.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: True sizing. Good fit for bigger kids. My son is 10 year old, but is 4'10" and weighs 135 pounds. So the youth helmets were to small and the adult sizes were to big. This is the right size for in between.
customer_reviews.author: frank d

customer_reviews.title: Great baseball helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Well made helmet for the price. We purchased this for our son that's 9, average sized and it fit great. Not too snug. The helmet held up well and he will probably be able to use it next season as well.
customer_reviews.author: KCJC

customer_reviews.title: Grandson love this!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson LOVES his batters helmet. Wore for his little league games, and we felt confident his melon was well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Still a great
customer_reviews.text: It’s my second helmet different color. Still a great helmet
customer_reviews.author: ZeroPerfect

customer_reviews.title: helmet
customer_reviews.text: grandson has the best looking helmet on his team. The more he plays baseball the more equipment he wants that is his own
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for a 5-7 year old and classic Easton quality.
customer_reviews.author: Always Growing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Already took a wild pitch to the head. Barely felt it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya & Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his helmet and the price was far better than what the offered in academy.
customer_reviews.author: krista bynum

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the helmet starting falling out and breaking after only 3 games.
customer_reviews.author: MWac

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet
customer_reviews.text: my son reports it fit's his noggin. Stays put, without falling and in general Works.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 yr old granddaughter it was a little big but it will work. I was a little disappointed it wasn't the bright blue as pictured. It was more of a navy. Very nice helmet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son who plays baseball fits good for my 15 yr old
customer_reviews.author: tarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and sure enough within the 1st week of ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and sure enough within the 1st week of wearing it, our kid was drilled by a wild pitch to the head... The helmet fits securely on his head.
customer_reviews.author: Omari

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Grat Protection.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fit great, offers great protection and looks great for my 9 year old. I don't worry about safety at all as this helmet is built strong.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Quesnel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet, watch the size, this does not fit my 7 yo, i will use it for my 5yo.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 11 year old needed for the season.
customer_reviews.author: musicman

customer_reviews.title: but the helmet was in good condition, he was happy with the helmet and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's first year playing baseball, so I was not feeling buying a new helmet. When I seen the option to buy a used helmet I was excited. I didn't know what to expect, but the helmet was in good condition, he was happy with the helmet and I was happy with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet but inspect padding carefully-mine was poorly assembled
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fit my son previously well but when it came this time the padding wasn’t even stuck completely to the helmet and looks like it might peel/R.I.P. off after a couple uses. I unfortunately missed the return window (argh!) but I would recommend inspecting this product carefully when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just got it...
customer_reviews.text: We'll see....just got it in the mail today. Son's head is exactly 20.5"and it fits firmly. I was concerned it may be too form but looking at it more closely after broken in a little it'll fit perfectly. I will report back on the quality, break in (if any), and good/bad in short time. It is glossy and not the flat color. My opinion, go with it and if you can't stand it wet sand it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 + a Husband

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart!
customer_reviews.text: We had just barely over one month and one huge piece of the foam already fell off. And of course it’s just past the return date. Extremely disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 year old nephew loved it and put it on right away
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old nephew loved it and put it on right away. It was of good quality and fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Helmets are good, but in case that matters to you they ...
customer_reviews.text: Helmets are good, but in case that matters to you they are GLOSSY, not matt finish as they appear in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ovdk

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. The inside liner is already starting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. The inside liner is already starting to fall out after 4 games and 5 practices.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Works great for protecting face and head with little guys they need it from their own bat to a thrown bat it isn’t always from a ball

customer_reviews.text: This was a great fit for my 16 year old ball player.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 year old 110lb boy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old 110lb boy. He has a rather large head and this was just what he needed.

customer_reviews.text: It has a logo on the front. Not like the one pictured. Not a huge deal. But not as pictured.

customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the helmet pictured (different color and look), and it fits much looser than other helmets of the same size. Not worth sending back, he'll grow into it eventually.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet. Good construction. Looks sharp. Kid loves it. I'm happy. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Scratches all over the helmet!

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in 3 months after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: The helmet suffered major cracks after minimal use for 3 months. No contact information for consumer is provided for warranty or exchange.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice helmets but they fit small and do not have a face mask.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased that it came on schedule and timely
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased that it came on schedule and timely. Grandson loves it for his little league games and so do many of this teammates

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my six year old well, and he has no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it is a helmet! Black, Shiny and smells new. Just the smell is worth the upgrade!

customer_reviews.text: Fits my 8 year old great! He has a large head and this will be perfect. Shipped quickly and looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and design. Fits better than other helmets tried by my son.

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet,  Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fit my 8 year old really well. It's comfortable, and even though the red in the image looks a bit on the pink side to me, it is a nice cherry red in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lua

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Youth Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a 5-year old. This fits well - solid and good padding on the inside. A little big but my son is on the small side and I expect we can use this for a few seasons. To clarify, it isn't too big that it will fall off. Comes in four colors, but I ordered red to match uniforms.
customer_reviews.author: D.Dunstock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my 7 year old little league. It fits him perfectly.

customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast (delivered within 2 days of purchase) Helmet looks nice and fits my 8 year old son well.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 11 year old great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his helmet. It looks great on him and fits him great, even over his glasses.

customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read reviews first. This helmet is NOT matte black and has an Easton logo on the front. Also the interior padding is very cheap. Returned immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for my six year old and a really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: It fits many of the kids well and they seem to like the look of it
customer_reviews.text: This helmet has seen a lot of use. I bought it last year and thought that we left it at the ball field and lost it. But, we later found it and allowed the team to use it as an extra. It fits many of the kids well and they seem to like the look of it, too. I haven't seen anyone take a ball off the helmet, and hope I don't, but I feel like it would hold up and protect the kids just fine. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality. using for my son's first year in tee ball

customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the helmet in the picture. I received a lower grade helmet than pictured. I will be returning it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and protection
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase another batters helmet for my son. His old one wore out inside the ears and the head protective foam was so loose it barely stayed on. This new Z5 was perfect. The color matches his team's, and the price was significantly lower than local sporting goods stores.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Helmet looks like it is great quality for the price HOWEVER I didn't get a chin strap with it. Ive just noticed that the product description and pictures don't show a chin strap, I just assumed you'd get one with it. After all, what good is a helmet if it doesn't stay on your head?

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving Picture - Not MATTE FINISH!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not like the picture...It is not matte finish but shiny!!! My son was very unhappy.

customer_reviews.title: ... just wears his hat with it and it fits fine. Will probably get a little more time out ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little big for my 4 almost 5 year old but he just wears his hat with it and it fits fine. Will probably get a little more time out of it. He loves the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: deceptive picture
customer_reviews.text: Photo looks like a matt finish... item delivered was glossy. Did not realize that there was a "Grip" alternative for this helmet with the matt finish. Shame on me for not checking more closely. Shame on product description for not indicating 'glossy' finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 8 year old great! Delivered on time, great helmet. We put a sticker with his last name and the back too. He's now excited for baseball season this summer.

product_meta.title: EASTON Z5 2.0 Baseball Batting Helmet Solid Color Series, Dual-Density Impact Absorption Foam, High Impact Resistant ABS Shell, Moisture Wicking BioDRI Liner, JAW GUARD Compatible
product_meta.description: ABS Plastic: High impact resistance providing an excellent protective shell Dual-Density Foam: High density, shock absorbing foam and low density comfort foam Bio-Dri Liner: Absorbs sweat and pulls it away from your head Wrapped Ears: Highly durable through the rigors of constant play Screamin' E logo on front of helmet can easily be removed Helmet Finish: Solid color semi-glass painted shell NOCSAE Approved: Meets the NOCSAE standard for Baseball/Softball batting helmets
feature_bullets: High impact resistant ABS shell for maximum protection
Dual-density foam liner for shock absorption and comfort
BioDri padded inner liner absorbs moisture
Wrapped ear pads for durability and comfort
Easton Screamin' E logo sticker on forehead is removable for team customization
ABS plastic provides an excellent protective shell against high impacts
Dual Density Foam absorbs sweat and pulls it away from your head
Wrapped Ears makes this helmet highly durable through the rigors of constant play
NOCSAE Approved: Meets the NOCSAE standard for Baseball/Softball batting helmets

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
